wikipedia_page.main: Amy Victoria Wadge is an English singer and songwriter. She has co-written tracks with Ed Sheeran, including "Thinking Out Loud" for which she won the 2016 Grammy Award for Song of the Year.

response: In February 2019, Tyler released “Hold On” as the lead single from her seventeenth studio album, Between the Earth and the Stars. Produced by David Mackay, the album features duets with Rod Stewart, Francis Rossi and Cliff Richard, with songs written by Barry Gibb and Amy Wadge, among others.

link_mentions.page: Grammy Award for Song of the Year
